attributes.action: establish a uniform size, spacing and font for letters/numerals on all vehicle registration plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to ensure that all vehicle registration plates are legible, and particularly to avoid fonts that are unclear, and to legislate against the use of plates where the letters/numbers are altered or are too close to one another for 'personalisation' purposes. Also for the plate srews to be a minimum distance from letters/numbers and in the same colour as the plate itself.
